com.adobe.acs.commons.forms
Interface FormsRouter

public interface FormsRouter

Internal routing used for internal routing of POST form submissions in the Filters.

          Checks if the Request has a suffix that matches the suffix registered to identify ACS AEM Commons form submissions (and returned by .getSuffix()).

getSuffix

String getSuffix()
Gets the suffix to look for to identify ACS AEM Commons form submissions.

Returns:
returns the Suffix

hasValidSuffix

boolean hasValidSuffix(org.apache.sling.api.SlingHttpServletRequest slingRequest)
Checks if the Request has a suffix that matches the suffix registered to identify ACS AEM Commons form submissions (and returned by .getSuffix()).

Parameters:
slingRequest - the SlingRequest obj
Returns:
true if the Request's suffix matches the suffix registered to identify ACS AEM Commons form submissions
